inputSpec.name: GenotypeSBI
inputSpec.label: Genotype Sequence Base Information
inputSpec.help: Datasets in the .sbi/.sbip format. Several datasets may be provided, which will produce distinct .vec/,vecp files. Note that the .sbi must already be annotated with true genotypes.

inputSpec.name: FeatureMapper
inputSpec.label: Feature Mapper
inputSpec.help: Mapper to use to produce the mapped input output tensors.

inputSpec.name: SampleName
inputSpec.label: Sample Name
inputSpec.help: Name of the sample to store in the .vecp file.

inputSpec.name: Ploidy
inputSpec.label: Ploidy
inputSpec.help: The organism ploidy (2 for humans, more for some plants).

inputSpec.name: GenomicContextLength
inputSpec.label: Genomic Context Length
inputSpec.help: Length of genomic context to use around site, in mapped features.

inputSpec.name: LabelSmoothingEpsilon
inputSpec.label: Label Smoothing Epsilon
inputSpec.help: Value of epsilon for label smoothing. Zero (default) is no smoothing.
